attributes.action: Repatriate the power to govern Britain in the areas taken as competencies by the eu.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned wish the government to repatriate all powers that have been taken as eu competencies to the elected British parliament, and that no additional powers can be taken without the agreement of the British people.  We ask that the Prime Minister makes it illegal for the United Kingdom to become a part of a federal state of europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
